item.title: Zero Dollar Checks and Mekorma MICR are both essential tools for managing your finances effectively.
item.description:
I recently encountered a situation with zero-dollar checks and Mekorma MICR software. To clarify, Dynamics GP software generates zero-dollar checks when an invoice is fully paid through methods like credit memos or manual payments. This often happens before a check run or when opting for automatic application of unapplied documents during check runs. These zero-dollar checks, appearing on the edit list after a check batch is created, act as placeholders, allowing for a remittance advice to be printed within the check run, confirming the invoice was settled using existing credits...
